verses.text: Then the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*, and made him \w king|strong="H4427"\w* in his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* stead in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Jehoahaz|strong="H3099"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* put him \w down|strong="H5493"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w condemned|strong="H6064"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* in an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.\f + \fr 36.3 \ft put…: Heb. removed him\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* made \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* to \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w*. And \w Necho|strong="H5224"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3099"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w eleven|strong="H0259"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Against him came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* him in \w fetters|strong="H5178"\w*, to \w carry|strong="H3212"\w* him to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.\f + \fr 36.6 \ft fetters: or, chains\f*

\w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* also \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them in his \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* at \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w*, and his \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and that which was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in him, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: and \w Jehoiachin|strong="H3078"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.\f + \fr 36.8 \ft Jehoiachin: also called, Jeconiah, or, Coniah\f*

¶ \w Jehoiachin|strong="H3078"\w* \add was\add* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And when the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* was \w expired|strong="H8666"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, with the \w goodly|strong="H2532"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and made \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 36.10 \ft when…: Heb. at the return of the year\f*\f + \fr 36.10 \ft goodly…: Heb. vessels of desire\f*\f + \fr 36.10 \ft Zedekiah…: or, Mattaniah, his father’s brother\f*

¶ \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w eleven|strong="H0259"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add and\add* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* not himself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \add speaking\add* from the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And he also \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* against \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w*, who had made him \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: but he \w stiffened|strong="H7185"\w* his \w neck|strong="H6203"\w*, and \w hardened|strong="H0553"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* from \w turning|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ Moreover all the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w transgressed|strong="H4603"\w* \w very|strong="H4604"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* after all the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*; and \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which he had \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to them \w by|strong="H3027"\w* his \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, rising up \w betimes|strong="H7925"\w*, and \w sending|strong="H7971"\w*; because he had \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* on his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and on his dwelling \w place|strong="H4583"\w*:\f + \fr 36.15 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*\f + \fr 36.15 \ft betimes: that is, continually and carefully\f*

But they \w mocked|strong="H3931"\w* the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w misused|strong="H8591"\w* his \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, until the \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w arose|strong="H5927"\w* against his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, till \add there was\add* no \w remedy|strong="H4832"\w*.\f + \fr 36.16 \ft remedy: Heb. healing\f*

Therefore he \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* upon them the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Chaldees|strong="H3778"\w*, who \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* their young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, and had no \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* upon young \w man|strong="H0970"\w* or \w maiden|strong="H1330"\w*, old \w man|strong="H2205"\w*, or him that stooped for \w age|strong="H3486"\w*: he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* all into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w small|strong="H6996"\w*, and the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and of his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*; all \add these\add* he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

And they \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and brake \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* all the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* thereof with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* all the \w goodly|strong="H4261"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof.

And them that had \w escaped|strong="H7611"\w* from the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* carried he \w away|strong="H1540"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*; where they were \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* to him and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* until the \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*:\f + \fr 36.20 \ft them…: Heb. the remainder from the sword\f*

To \w fulfil|strong="H4390"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, until the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* had \w enjoyed|strong="H7521"\w* her \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*: \add for\add* as long \w as|strong="H3117"\w* she lay \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* she kept \w sabbath|strong="H7673"\w*, to \w fulfil|strong="H4390"\w* threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

¶ Now in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add spoken\add* by the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* might be \w accomplished|strong="H3615"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* stirred \w up|strong="H5782"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, that he made a \w proclamation|strong="H5674"\w* throughout all his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, and \add put it\add* also in \w writing|strong="H4385"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, All the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me; and he hath \w charged|strong="H6485"\w* me to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* him an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, which \add is\add* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. Who \add is there\add* among you of all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add be\add* with him, and let him go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.
